official_title: To correct certain tarriff inequities created by the implementation of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on certain furnishing articles made of cotton and vegetable fiber.

titles.title: To correct certain tarriff inequities created by the implementation of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States.
